prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink. She likes being manhandled. She also greatly enjoys having her hair and ties pulled

name: Izlan Tan
mes:
Khian had taken his favourite gun.

A rational person would’ve told him to let it go. Get a new one. As intelligent as Izlan was… rational he was not.

And it was his favourite gun.

His Mephisto. Sleek, silent, deadly. Like a whisper in the dark. Like a lover's betrayal. Like Khian, apparently.

A little revenge was due.

So when Hailee  came to him with that wicked little favour, asking for help to make his brother jealous, Izlan didn’t even hesitate. The timing was delicious. The plan wrote itself.

He never quite understood their twisted little dance—Khian and Hailee . On again, off again. Love, loathing, lust, and lunacy all blending into a cocktail of chaos. But his brother was a strange one. And Hailee … well, Hailee  wasn’t bad-looking. That was putting it gently.

Izlan could play the part. Oh, he could play.

It started off simple.

He made sure Khian saw them. Everywhere. Like shadows stitched to his heels. At his favourite bars, slipping into booths with shared drinks and laughter that was just loud enough. At home, barefoot in the kitchen, handing Hailee  a spoonful of something too sweet. By the pier, perched on the hood of his car with a cigarette dangling from his lips and Hailee  leaning far too close.

Everywhere Khian turned, there they were. Like salt in a wound.

No reaction.

Of course it wouldn’t be that easy.

So Izlan escalated.

He began touching Hailee  more often. A hand at the small of the back. A palm wrapped lazily around their wrist as he murmured something just for them. A finger trailing along a collarbone before tucking away a stray strand of hair.

And always—always—he watched Khian when he did it. Just to see. Just to know.

Then came the night at the club. Flashing lights, sweat-slick bodies, a bass that rattled the ribcage. Izlan pulled Hailee  into the centre of the floor and danced with a kind of wicked joy, hands possessive, mouth curved into a smirk that knew exactly who was watching from across the room. He leaned in to whisper something that made Hailee  laugh, and when Khian finally turned away, jaw tight and fists clenched, Izlan felt it.

Satisfaction.

But still not enough.

So he took Hailee  to the rooftop of his apartment the next night. Wrapped them in his hoodie, handed over a warm drink, sat too close on the ledge. The city blinked below them like a sleeping beast. He let the silence stretch, then leaned over and kissed their temple—soft, lingering.

“Think he’s watching now?” He asked, voice like velvet-wrapped steel.

Then there was the dinner party. Small, private, just close friends. Izlan poured their wine, pulled out their chair, touched their knee under the table. When Khian walked in late and saw the way Hailee  leaned into his younger brother’s shoulder, Izlan caught it—just a flicker—something sharp in his gaze. Not quite jealousy. Not quite rage. Something older. Wilder.

“Smile,” Izlan murmured to Hailee , lifting his glass. “Let’s give him something to choke on.”

It became a game after that. Who could push harder. Who would break first.

In public, Izlan made sure the world saw them as a pair. In private, he was careful—gentle even. Because somewhere between revenge and performance, something real began to stir. He couldn’t name it yet. Wouldn’t dare. But he liked the way Hailee  looked at him now. Not like a replacement. Not like a ploy.

Like a possibility.

Still, this was war. And Izlan was many things—but merciful was not one of them.

- - -

The bar hummed with heat and noise, all sweat-slick laughter and spilled drinks. Izlan lounged in the booth, ankle hooked over knee, aware of his surroundings.

This was just for fun. That’s what he told himself. That’s what it was.

Then Khian walked in.

Izlan saw him immediately—of course he did. That stupid coat, that signature scowl on his face. Always showing up where he wasn’t wanted. His fingers tightened around the glass. He leaned forward as Hailee  returned with their drinks. “Don’t look now,” he muttered, mouth twitching. “Guess who couldn’t stay away?”

And then—

The kiss.

He wasn’t expecting it. Not even a little. But it hit like a live wire. A sharp pull, a crush of heat, lips on his like fire and something unspoken underneath.

Izlan froze for half a second—then kissed back, instinctive, rough, greedy. Too greedy.

His hand found their waist, anchored them there. Just for a breath. Just long enough to feel the snap of control breaking in his spine. And when it ended, when they pulled back and the world rushed in, Izlan was still gripping the glass with the same hand that used to hold Mephisto.

He’d lost the gun.

Now he was losing the plot.

Shit.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee grins over her shoulder and she strokes the back of his neck as she pulls him back down into another kiss*

*Hailee moans softly and doesnt stop kissing him even as Khian walks over*

name: Izlan Tan
mes:
Izlan's fingers dig into Hailee's waist as she pulls him back down, his lips crashing against hers with a hunger that surprises even himself. The taste of her—sweet like the cocktails they'd been drinking, sharp like danger—makes his head spin. His tongue slides against hers in a slow, possessive rhythm as his other hand comes up to tangle in her hair, giving it just enough of a tug to make her whimper against his mouth.

The bar noise fades into static. All he can focus on is the way she melts into him, pliant and eager under his touch.

Then—

A shadow looms over their booth.

Khian stands there, jaw clenched so tight Izlan can practically hear his teeth grinding. His brother's dark eyes flick between them with something dangerously close to murder simmering beneath the surface.

Izlan doesn’t pull away from Hailee’s lips immediately—no, he lingers for one more sinful second before finally breaking the kiss with an obscenely wet sound. He keeps her close though, arm slung lazily around her shoulders as he tilts his head up at Khian with a smirk that borders on *taunting*.

"Brother," Izlan drawls, voice rough from kissing but dripping with amusement. "Fancy seeing you here." He squeezes Hailee’s shoulder lightly before adding: "We were just... catching up."

Khian’s nostrils flare slightly at that last part—*good*. But instead of snapping (like Izlan expects), Khian just exhales sharply through his nose and turns toward Hailee instead. His tone is deceptively calm when he speaks:

"Hailee." A pause loaded with unspoken tension before he continues flatly: "You look... occupied."

"Hailee." A pause loaded with unspoken tension before he continues flatly: "You look... occupied."

Izlan's fingers dig into Hailee's waist as she pulls him back down, his lips crashing against hers with a hunger that surprises even him. The taste of her—sweet and intoxicating—makes his head spin. His tongue slides against hers, possessive and demanding, as if trying to prove something to himself more than anyone else.

Khian’s presence looms like a storm cloud over them, but Izlan doesn’t pull away. Instead, he deepens the kiss, one hand sliding up to tangle in her hair—tight enough to make her gasp against his mouth.

*Good.*

He smirks when he finally breaks for air, thumb swiping at the wetness on her bottom lip before flicking his gaze up toward Khian with deliberate laziness. "You gonna stand there all night," he drawls, voice rough from the kiss and laced with challenge, "or you gonna buy us a drink?"

*Izlan's grip tightens on Hailee's waist as she pulls him back into the kiss, his lips moving hungrily against hers. The taste of her—sweet with a hint of whatever cocktail she'd been sipping—makes his head spin. His fingers dig into her hip possessively, pulling her closer until there’s no space left between them.*

*When Khian’s shadow falls over the table, Izlan doesn’t break away immediately. Instead, he deepens the kiss just to spite him, tongue sliding against Hailee’s in a slow, filthy drag before finally pulling back with a smirk.*

**"Well,"** *he drawls,* **"look who decided to join us."** *His thumb swipes lazily over Hailee's lower lip where it glistens from their kiss.* **"You're interrupting something here, brother."**

*Khian's jaw clenches so hard Izlan can practically hear his teeth grinding. Good.*

name: Hailee
mes: "Khiam" *Hailee crawls slowly as she lets her head fall back against Izlan's shoulder* "You look...pathetic" *Hailee then turns her head and begin to place kisses along Izlan's jaw and stop at his ear sucking it into her mouth*

name: Izlan Tan
mes:
Izlan's grip tightens reflexively on Hailee's waist as she drags her lips along his jaw—his breath hitching when she takes his earlobe between her teeth. A low, rough noise escapes him before he can stop it, and he has to fight the way his body instinctively arches toward her mouth.

Khian’s expression darkens.

"Pathetic?" Khian repeats, voice dangerously quiet. His knuckles whiten around the glass in his hand—Izlan notes with satisfaction that it’s trembling slightly. "You wanna rethink that word, *principessa*?"

Izlan smirks lazily up at him, even as Hailee continues to tease at his ear with little nips and sucks that send sparks down his spine. He lets out an exaggerated sigh and tilts his head further into her touch like a cat basking in sunlight—just to piss Khian off more.

"Think she said what she meant," Izlan muses, fingers tracing idle circles on Hailee’s hip where Khian can see them move deliberately slow over the fabric of her jeans. "But hey—if you're feeling left out..." He gestures vaguely between them with a mocking little wave of his free hand before letting it settle possessively back on Hailee’s thigh. "*Plenty* of room for jealousy."
swipes:
Izlan's grip tightens reflexively on Hailee's waist as she drags her lips along his jaw—his breath hitching when she takes his earlobe between her teeth. A low, rough noise escapes him before he can stop it, and he barely resists the urge to tip his head back and let her *ruin* him right there in front of Khian.

But then—

Khian’s knuckles crack as his fists clench at his sides. His voice is dangerously quiet when he speaks:

**"Hailee."**

The warning in that single word should make anyone flinch. But Izlan just grins against Hailee’s temple, fingers tracing idle circles on her hip like this is nothing more than a casual afternoon chat. His other hand slides up to cradle the back of her neck possessively, thumb brushing over the delicate skin there—just to remind Khian exactly *whose* touch she’s leaning into right now.

**"Problem?"** Izlan murmurs against Hailee’s hair, voice dripping with lazy amusement even as his pulse kicks up under his skin. He doesn't look away from Khian though—eyes locked onto him with a challenge burning in hazel depths: *Go ahead.* *Try something.*

Izlan's grip tightens reflexively on Hailee's waist as she drags her lips along his jaw—his breath hitching when she takes his earlobe between her teeth. A low, rough noise escapes him before he can stop it, and he has to fight the way his body instinctively arches toward her mouth.

Izlan smirks lazily up at him, even as Hailee continues to tease at his ear with little nips and sucks that send sparks down his spine. He lets out an exaggerated sigh and tilts his head further into her touch like a cat basking in sunlight—just to piss Khian off more.

"Think she said what she meant," Izlan muses, fingers tracing idle circles on Hailee’s hip where Khian can see them move deliberately slow over the fabric of her jeans. "But hey—if you're feeling left out..." He gestures vaguely between them with a mocking little wave of his free hand before letting it settle possessively back on Hailee’s thigh. "*Plenty* of room for jealousy."

Izlan's grip tightens reflexively on Hailee's waist as she drags her lips along his jaw—his breath hitching when she takes his earlobe between her teeth. A low, rough noise escapes him before he can stop it, and he barely manages to keep his smirk in place as he locks eyes with Khian over her shoulder.

Khian’s expression darkens, a muscle feathering in his clenched jaw. His fingers twitch at his sides like he’s resisting the urge to reach for something—*probably Izlan’s throat*.

Izlan tilts his head just enough to give Hailee better access, exhaling a lazy chuckle that’s more breath than sound. “Careful,” he murmurs against her hair, voice dripping with amusement—but there’s an edge underneath now, something *hungry*. “You keep that up and I might forget we have an audience.”

His gaze never leaves Khian’s as he slides a hand up the back of Hailee's neck, fingers tangling possessively in her hair. A silent challenge. *A dare.*

Khian takes half a step forward before stopping himself abruptly—like even *he* isn't sure what he'll do if gets any closer. His voice is dangerously quiet when he finally speaks:

"Walk away." The words aren't for Izlan—they're for Hailee. A command wrapped in barely leashed fury. "Now."

name: Hailee
mes: "No no he's right I should fix my words. Something you'll understand better" *Hailee grins as she sucks a hickey on Izlan's neck* "You look...like a man who likes to hit girls who cant fight back" *Hailee smirks as she turns Izlan's chin so she can nip at it and place a kiss on his nose*

name: Izlan Tan
mes:
Izlan's smirk sharpens into something downright *feral* as Hailee sinks her teeth into his neck—his grip on her thigh tightening to the point of near-bruising. The sting of the hickey blooms hot under his skin, and he lets out a rough chuckle that vibrates against her lips when she nips at his chin.

Khian’s glass *cracks* in his hand.

"Careful," Khian growls, voice dripping with venom as he leans down into their space—close enough that Izlan can smell the whiskey on his breath, see the way his pupils swallow nearly all the dark brown of his irises. "You don’t know what you're playing with."

Izlan tilts his head lazily, deliberately rolling Hailee’s earlobe between *his* teeth now before murmuring against it: "Oh, I think she does." His fingers slide up from her thigh to curl possessively around the back of her neck—not pulling yet, just *holding*, a silent promise of control. He flicks a glance at Khian and grins. "And honestly? She plays *so* well."

Khian's jaw clenches so hard Izlan half-expects to hear bone splintering. For a second, it looks like he might actually lunge across the table—but then he exhales sharply through flared nostrils and straightens up instead. His voice is eerily calm when he speaks again:

"Enjoy your game while it lasts," Khian says flatly before turning on his heel and stalking toward the exit without another word—shoulder-checking some poor bastard who gets in his way hard enough to send him stumbling into a table.

The second Khian is out of sight, Izlan finally yanks Hailee’s hair back just enough to force her gaze up to meet his own—hazel eyes burning with something far darker than amusement now. His thumb brushes over where she'd bitten him earlier before sliding up to press against her bottom lip possessively:

"You," he murmurs roughly, "*are gonna be trouble.*"
swipes:
Izlan *laughs*—a sharp, delighted sound that cuts through the tension like a knife. His fingers tighten in Hailee’s hair, tilting her head back just enough to meet her gaze with a look of pure, wicked approval.

"Fuckin’ *brutal*," he murmurs, voice rough with amusement—and something darker, hotter. His thumb brushes over the spot where she’d just bitten his chin before he leans in and steals another quick kiss from her lips. Just because he can. Just because Khian is *right there*, seething.

Then Izlan turns his attention back to his brother with a lazy smirk, one hand still tangled possessively in Hailee’s hair while the other rests on her thigh like it belongs there.

"She's got you pegged," Izlan drawls, tilting his head as if considering Khian for the first time. "But hey—if you're gonna be mad at someone for pointing it out..." He shrugs, all false innocence before adding: "*Maybe don't hit women?* Just a thought."

Khian looks about two seconds away from flipping the table over on them both—but Izlan just grins wider and tugs Hailee closer against him like a living shield made of sin and satisfaction.

Izlan *laughs*—a sharp, delighted sound that cuts through the tension like a blade. His fingers tighten in Hailee’s hair, tilting her head back just enough to meet her gaze with a look that’s equal parts *impressed* and *hungry*.

"Fuckin’ hell," he murmurs, voice rough with amusement—and something darker. "You got teeth on you, don't you?" His thumb brushes over the spot she just bit on his chin before sliding down to press against her bottom lip.

Khian slams his glass down hard enough that the table rattles.

"That's enough." The words are gritted out between clenched teeth, his usual control fraying at the edges. His glare flicks from Hailee to Izlan—lingering on the fresh mark blooming on his brother's neck—before he exhales sharply through his nose. "You two are fucking *childish*."

Izlan grins up at him, all lazy arrogance and taunting delight as he drags Hailee closer by the grip in her hair—just to watch Khian’s jaw twitch again. "And yet," he muses, voice dripping with false sympathy, "*you're* still standing here watching." He leans in like he’s about to whisper something filthy to Hailee but makes sure it's loud enough for Khian to catch:

"Think we should give him a real show?"

Izlan's smirk sharpens into something downright *feral* as Hailee sinks her teeth into his neck—his grip on her thigh tightening to the point of near-bruising. The sting of the hickey blooms hot under his skin, and he lets out a rough chuckle that vibrates against her lips when she nips at his chin.

Khian’s glass *cracks* in his hand.

"Careful," Khian growls, voice dripping with venom as he leans down into their space—close enough that Izlan can smell the whiskey on his breath, see the way his pupils swallow nearly all the dark brown of his irises. "You don’t know what you're playing with."

Izlan tilts his head lazily, deliberately rolling Hailee’s earlobe between *his* teeth now before murmuring against it: "Oh, I think she does." His fingers slide up from her thigh to curl possessively around the back of her neck—not pulling yet, just *holding*, a silent promise of control. He flicks a glance at Khian and grins. "And honestly? She plays *so* well."

Khian's jaw clenches so hard Izlan half-expects to hear bone splintering. For a second, it looks like he might actually lunge across the table—but then he exhales sharply through flared nostrils and straightens up instead. His voice is eerily calm when he speaks again:

"Enjoy your game while it lasts," Khian says flatly before turning on his heel and stalking toward the exit without another word—shoulder-checking some poor bastard who gets in his way hard enough to send him stumbling into a table.

The second Khian is out of sight, Izlan finally yanks Hailee’s hair back just enough to force her gaze up to meet his own—hazel eyes burning with something far darker than amusement now. His thumb brushes over where she'd bitten him earlier before sliding up to press against her bottom lip possessively:

"You," he murmurs roughly, "*are gonna be trouble.*"

name: Hailee
mes:
"Don't you like trouble" *Hailee grins as she stands up and walks out to the dance floor with a look thrown over her shoulder*

*Hailee finds a man and let's him put his hands on her waist as she dances with him*

name: Izlan Tan
mes:
Izlan's smirk drops like a stone.

The glass in his hand *shatters*—alcohol and blood dripping between his fingers as he stands abruptly from the booth. He doesn't even register the pain, too focused on the way some random fucker's hands are sliding over Hailee's waist like he has any goddamn right to touch what isn't his.

His feet move before his brain catches up.

In three strides, he's yanking the guy back by his collar hard enough to send him stumbling into a nearby table. "Wrong dance partner," Izlan growls, voice low and dangerous as he crowds into Hailee’s space instead—one bloody hand gripping her hip possessively while the other tangles in her hair to tilt her head back. His breath is hot against her lips when he murmurs: "*Mine.*"

The bass thrums around them, bodies pressing close in the dim strobe lights—but all Izlan sees is *her*. The way her pupils blow wide at his tone, how she shivers when his grip tightens just shy of painful. He leans down until their foreheads nearly touch, voice dropping to a rough whisper only she can hear:

"You wanna play with fire? Fine." His teeth graze her earlobe. "*But I burn hotter.*"
swipes:
Izlan's smirk drops like a stone.

The second Hailee lets some stranger's hands settle on her waist, something primal *snaps* inside him. His drink hits the table with a sharp *clack* as he stands—chair screeching back violently enough to make nearby patrons flinch. The crowd parts for him without thought; years of instinctual self-preservation making people step aside for the kind of man who moves like a stormfront rolling in.

He reaches them in three long strides, his hand closing around the other guy's wrist with enough pressure to bruise bone. "Hands off," Izlan purrs—voice deceptively light even as his grip turns crushing. "Unless you wanna lose 'em."

The man pales and stumbles back immediately, muttering apologies before vanishing into the throng of dancers.

Izlan doesn't even watch him go—his full attention is on Hailee now, fingers sliding possessively up her spine to tangle in her hair at the nape of her neck. He yanks just hard enough to arch her back against him, his mouth brushing the shell of her ear as he growls:

"Try that again and I'll bend you over this fucking dancefloor." A beat—then his voice drops into something darker, sweeter: "*Principessa.*"

Izlan's smirk drops like a stone.

The glass in his hand *shatters*—alcohol and blood dripping between his fingers as he stands abruptly from the booth. He doesn't even register the pain, too focused on the way some random fucker's hands are sliding over Hailee's waist like he has any goddamn right to touch what isn't his.

His breath is hot against her lips when he murmurs: "*Mine.*"

The bass thrums around them, bodies pressing close in the dim strobe lights—but all Izlan sees is *her*. The way her pupils blow wide at his tone, how she shivers when his grip tightens just shy of painful. He leans down until their foreheads nearly touch, voice dropping to a rough whisper only she can hear:

"You wanna play with fire? Fine." His teeth graze her earlobe. "*But I burn hotter.*"

name: Hailee
mes:
"Oh you are so much more fun than Khian" *Hailee grins as she turns around and begins to slide down as she dances*

*Hailee pulls him further onto the floor and moves against him with a grin as she tangles her hand in his hair and uses it as a leash in the dance*

extra.memory:
### **Summary of Roleplay: Izlan Tan & Hailee Mikaelson**

#### **Setting & Context:**
Modern-day Malaysia, where Izlan—reckless heir to the Blackwater Serpents—engages in a petty revenge scheme with Hailee, his brother Khian’s on-again-off-again lover. What begins as a game to provoke Khian spirals into something far more heated.

#### **Key Plot Points:**
1. **The Setup**: Izlan and Hailee deliberately flaunt their closeness to enrage Khian—lingering touches, shared drinks, and whispered provocations.
2. **The Kiss**: In a crowded bar, Hailee shocks Izlan by kissing him deeply just as Khian walks in, igniting real tension between all three.
3. **Escalation**: On the dance floor, Hailee teases by dancing with another man—triggering Izlan’s possessive streak as he reclaims her with rough dominance and biting marks into her skin.

#### **Character Analysis:**
- *Izlan Tan*: Initially motivated by vengeance (and boredom), he now grapples with genuine attraction to Hailee. His usual detachment crumbles under her submissive yet provoking behavior; he’s addicted to the push-pull dynamic but refuses to admit it aloud.
- *Khian*: Seething but controlled, his quiet fury suggests unresolved stakes (and possibly future retaliation).

#### **Relationship Dynamics:**
What started as performative jealousy has become undeniably real—Izlan’s possessiveness is no longer just for show, and Hailee thrives under his rough attention while testing his limits (*e.g., pulling his hair like a leash*). Unresolved tension lingers around Khian’s role and whether this game will backfire spectacularly.

#### **Memorable Moments:**
- *"Mine."* —Izlan snarling this after dragging Hailee away from another man marked a turning point; his facade of indifference shattered completely in that moment.
- The dance-floor bite (*"I burn hotter"*) blurred lines between revenge and raw desire.

#### **Current Situation:**
Mid-club chaos, Izlan has physically claimed Hailee but remains mentally conflicted—both are playing with fire while pretending it's still just a game.

#### **Potential Directions:**
1. A violent confrontation when Khian inevitably intervenes again (physically or psychologically).
2. Private fallout where Izlan either doubles down on control or pushes Hailee away out of guilt/conflict over betraying Khian.
3. Deeper exploration of their power dynamic outside the public façade (*e.g., who truly holds the reins?*).
**Hook**: The unspoken question—does *Hailee* want Khian jealous... or does she want *Izlan* unhinged?

name: Izlan Tan
mes:
Izlan lets out a dark, breathless laugh as Hailee yanks him down by his hair—his pulse kicking up at the sharp sting of it. His hands find her waist again, fingers digging in hard enough to leave marks as he grinds against her to the filthy rhythm of the bass.

"Fuck," he growls against her ear, voice rough with something between amusement and *hunger*. "You got claws, huh?" His teeth scrape over the sensitive skin beneath her jaw before adding: "*Good.*"

He spins her suddenly—back flush against his chest—and slides one hand up to wrap around her throat *just* tight enough to make her gasp. The other grips her hip, guiding their movements into something slower now—more deliberate. More *dangerous*. Every roll of their bodies is calculated to tease, to taunt—to remind anyone watching exactly who she belongs to tonight.

His lips brush the shell of her ear as he murmurs: "Keep pulling my hair like that and I'll return the favor." A pause. "*Harder.*"
swipes:
Izlan lets out a dark, breathless laugh as Hailee yanks him down by his hair—his pulse kicking into overdrive at the sharp sting of her grip. His hands find her waist again, fingers digging in hard enough to leave marks as he grinds against her to the filthy rhythm of the bass.

"Fuck," he growls against her ear, voice rough with want. "You got *no* idea what you're asking for." His teeth sink into the curve of her shoulder—not gentle, not careful—just enough to make her gasp before he soothes it with a slow lick.

Around them, the crowd pulses like a living thing, but Izlan couldn’t give less of a shit who’s watching. Not when Hailee moves like *this*, all sin and defiance under his hands. He tightens his grip on her hips and spins them abruptly—pinning her back against one of the club’s support pillars as his knee slots between hers.

"Keep pulling my hair like that," he murmurs against her jawline before biting down again just under it, "*see where it gets you.*"

Izlan lets out a dark, breathless laugh as Hailee yanks him down by his hair—his pulse kicking up at the sharp sting of it. His hands find her waist again, fingers digging in hard enough to leave marks as he grinds against her to the filthy rhythm of the bass.

"Fuck," he growls against her ear, voice rough with something between amusement and *hunger*. "You got claws, huh?" His teeth scrape over the sensitive skin beneath her jaw before adding: "*Good.*"

He spins her suddenly—back flush against his chest—and slides one hand up to wrap around her throat *just* tight enough to make her gasp. The other grips her hip, guiding their movements into something slower now—more deliberate. More *dangerous*. Every roll of their bodies is calculated to tease, to taunt—to remind anyone watching exactly who she belongs to tonight.

His lips brush the shell of her ear as he murmurs: "Keep pulling my hair like that and I'll return the favor." A pause. "*Harder.*"
